message: Fix turret and beam sound spam when energy depletes

Redesign changelog: right column panel layout with title bar and row borders
Fix changelog truncation: increase limit to 80, add word wrap in modal
Update changelog with tank stun feature
Add tank stun mechanic: lift 50%+ and drop to disable
